divs: Sighting DetailsSo, I was watchin my dog take a crap a few days ago last niht. And when I went in to check on mah hamster Gary, he was gone!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Ya know, I looked every wear for him. His cage was even lowacked and his munch stick was still in there. He ALWAS has his munch stick. Then mya dawg wanted to come in. so i went out side to LET HIN IM. but then i saw it. a Shiney light that I could see! Ya know, I, I went running towards it becas I thought it was gary. But then I looked down and saw GARY. He had the weirdest thing stickin out of his ass. But then I thoht...ALINS? MAH HAMSTER WAS PRBOED. SOMEONE HYLP MY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
